com.facebook.buck.core.build.buildable.context

Interface BuildableContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBuildableContext, RecordArtifactVerifier

    public interface BuildableContext
    Context object that is specific to an individual BuildRule. This differs from BuildContext in that a BuildContext is a context that is shared by all BuildRules whereas a new BuildableContext is created for each call to BuildRule.getBuildSteps(com.facebook.buck.core.build.context.BuildContext, BuildableContext).
